workflow.name: DifferentialExpression
workflow.description: Identify features that are differentially expressed between two or more conditions in metabolomics data. This analysis is crucial for understanding the underlying molecular mechanisms associated with different biological states, such as disease progression, drug treatment effects, or environmental perturbations.

workflow.name: Clustering
workflow.description: Identify sample clustering from uploaded data table

processing.name: TableProcessing
processing.description: Data processing steps for concentration table, peak table, mzTab table upload

processing.name: ListProcessing
processing.description: Data processing steps for annotated metabolite feature upload

processing.name: JointListProcessing
processing.description: Data processing steps for both annotated metabolite features and genes
